about_the_game:
What Is Included

The demo provides a glimpse of our narrative style and basic gameplay. If you enjoy the stories in the demo and can find your first passage, you'll likely enjoy the main game as well.

Gameplay

Read the stories and look for anything unusual. The definition of unusual may vary from story to story. Also be careful to notice any changes in the stories you've already read. The All Whispering Tome may or may not change shape and content before your eyes in any moment. You must read carefully to uncover the stories beyond the stories.

About Main Game

All Whispering Tome is a captivating reading game where you explore a vast library of untold tales. Within its weathered pages lie stories whispered through time and space, both prophecies of futures yet to unfold and echoes of forgotten pasts.

As you decipher these stories, the narratives evolve, even the words may or may not shift before your eyes. All the hints are hidden within the ever-evolving nature of these stories.

Lose yourself in these mesmerizing tales and uncover the stories beyond the stories in the All Whispering Tome.

content_descriptors.notes: Game is text based with some pictures to support narravites. Topics may not be appropriate for all ages but not exceptionally out of ordinary.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: All Whispering Tome - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: All Whispering Tome is a reading adventure game about exploring stories. The hidden stories in the game are unfold while you read multiple seamingly unrelated stories. May you discover what the All Whispering Tome, whispers to you.
